body.p: Synopsys Security Scan Extension for Azure DevOps enables you to configure your Azure pipeline to run Synopsys security testing and take action on the results. Synopsys Security Scan leverages Synopsys Bridge, allowing you to run tests for several Synopsys products from the command line.
The Synopsys Security Scan for Azure DevOps Visual Studio Marketplace link is .Synopsys Security Scan for Azure DevOps requires appropriate licenses for all Synopsys applications used.
